Description: Body sherd of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery kernos with start of vessel holder; white slip; exterior: slip very worn; on top, trace of brown motif; on side, part of double guilloche pattern; graffito inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: The sherd joins British Museum 1924,1201.519. See A.W. Johnston, 'Fragmenta Britannica IV', Bulletin of the Institute of Classical Studies 57 (2014) 121-124, figs. 11-12.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.2173) (phase 2)
